description: The Solazo Down Hooded Jacket elevates your style and body temperature. Insulated with lightweight, lofty, and responsibly sourced 600-fill down, the Solazo features a durable ripstop shell with a DWR finish to shed the elements.
name: Cotopaxi Solazo Hooded Down Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 20D ripstop nylon with DWR finish - 41 g

All of the down insulation in the Solazo is Responsible Down Standard (RDS) certified, which means it comes from ethically sourced down and feathers through a transparent, audited supply chain. This ensures ducks and geese are not harmed in the making of our apparel.

This product is produced at a forward-thinking factory in northeastern China, where worker well-being is a top priority. The factory is also working to meet the highest standards of sustainability and efficiency. Learn more about this factory.
